body:
**For claims between £10,000 and £100,000**

Telephone 0300 123 1057, Monday to Friday, 8:30am to 5pm

**For claims over £100,000**

Telephone 0300 123 1372, Monday to Friday, 8:30am to 5pm
heading: Contact details for claims of £10,000 or more
lede: You can't use this service to contact HMCTS about a money claim of £10,000 or more. Instead, call one of the numbers below.
